prospectors.greeting: Hey, this is our find! You want salvage, go somewhere else!
prospectors.angry: Listen, I get we're not supposed to be here. But when an IPF vessel crash lands on this poor colony, well, there are some opportunities you can't miss.
prospectors.threatened: Trying to intimidate ol' Robert? That ain't gonna work. Don't worry, this scrapper drone will make your death painless, if you're lucky.
prospectors.roll_fail: And lose out on all this bob? I don't think so!
prospectors.roll_pass: ...Fine. We'll move on, but we won't forget this, you hear?!
prospectors.generic: So, remind me, why are you here?!

new_hope_bartender.greeting: Welcome to the New Hope Central, where this fine establishment is ran by yours truly. What'll it be?
new_hope_bartender.serve: One ultrafiltered beer coming up. (He pours your drink).
new_hope_bartender.info2: Oh, I heard about that. Terrible thing, truly. Sorry, I deal in drinks, not in specifications on how to safely retrieve black box data from a shitload of fires.
new_hope_bartender.info3: They did not, I'm afraid. But those peeps over there might know a thing or two. I heard them talking about doing just that. Go ask them, maybe.
new_hope_bartender.grateful1: ...Is it over? What on Salvation just happened?!
new_hope_bartender.grateful2: Looting off the dead is sick. I am glad you took care of them. Consider yourself welcome at the New Hope Central any time you feel like coming around here.
new_hope_bartender.grateful3: You might wanna take that black box of his corpse. Looks like it'll be useful.

new_hope_prospectors.greeting: (He groans) Leave me alone, unless you wanna grab me another shot...
new_hope_prospectors.distrustful1: And you're that arsehole who kicked us out of that crash site! What the bloody hell do you want with us now?!
new_hope_prospectors.distrustful_fail: Go to hell! (Sensing the oncoming battle, the bartender and other patrons head for cover or flee the building).
new_hope_prospectors.distrustful_pass: Well, you've already taken the site for yourself, what more do you want with us then, hmm?
new_hope_prospectors.distrustful4: While we were there, we were able to nag the ship's black box. Take it, all yours, no value in it whatsoever...
new_hope_prospectors.distrustful5: No worries. And... Sorry for trying to loot the site so soon.
new_hope_prospectors.vengeful: And you're that arsehole who killed my buddies! Get 'em, drone! (Sensing the oncoming battle, the bartender and other patrons head for cover or flee the building)
